name: simplepwntools
description: Simple collection of tools that help with CTF challanges. This is alpha version with bugs. Still in development

scripts.nodemon: cd Dist && export NODE_PATH=. && nodemon Main.js
scripts.start: cd Dist && export NODE_PATH=. && node Main.js
scripts.example: cd Dist && export NODE_PATH=. && node Examples/General.js
